Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
Manages the game state, including loading, saving, and creating new games. Utilises JSON serialization/deserialization to persist game data.

      Loads a game from the specified save file path.
      Parameters:
      saveFilePath - the path to the save file

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame(String saveFilePath)
      Saves the current game state to the specified save file path.
      Parameters:
      saveFilePath - the path to the save file

    • newGame

      public void newGame(int num, String name, String type)
      Creates a new game with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      num - the save file number
      name - the name of the pet
      type - the type of the pet

    • saveFileExists

      public static String saveFileExists(int num)
      Checks if a save file exists for the given save file number. If the file exists, attempts to load the pet's name from it.
      Parameters:
      num - the save file number
      Returns:
      the pet's name if found, "New Game" if the file does not exist, or an error message if loading fails

    • getSaveFile

      public static SaveFile getSaveFile()
      Retrieves the current save file.
      Returns:
      the current save file

    • setSaveFile

      public void setSaveFile(SaveFile newSaveFile)
      Sets the current save file.
      Parameters:
      newSaveFile - the new save file to set
